title: Dormant Account Activity
description: This alert is triggered when there is activity on an account that has been dormant for a long period of time. It helps to identify potential unauthorized access or reactivation of old accounts.

title: Multiple deposits in quick succession
description: This alert is triggered when multiple deposits are made in a short period of time. It helps to monitor unusual activity that may indicate fraud or system issues.
